name: Brick Breaker Infinity+ Free
description:
Brick Breaker is a classic funny game. Bricks (or Blocks) are display at each level. You must break all those bricks with a white ball. To break those steel bricks, you must hit them by 3 times using the ball. GEM or other pickup will drop down as a reward for break such bricks.

In the shop, you can upgrade your breaker's length and other power with GEM that you collect in the game. Share this funny game via Facebook or Twitter we will give you some GEMs as a thank you! Rate this game will also earn some GEMs!

Features:
- Numerous levels are provided
- Leaderboard is supported for you to share your score with friends all over the world
- upgrade power by GEMs that collected in the game
- Numerous pickups are provided at each level
